means: 模仿( imitate的过去式和过去分词 )

sentence.Network_en: Her style of painting has been imitated by other artists.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的绘画风格为其他画家所模仿。

sentence.Network_en: The work lacks originality , ie is copied or imitated.
Girls imitated me. Now I'm trying to imitate a city girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 姑娘们过去个个都模仿我, 可现在呢,我自个儿反而要去模仿城里的姑娘们.

PerfectNetExp.abs: He imitated the ancients in painting ., 他在绘画上师法古人.
improved design on imitated mechanism of the bevel gear processing ., 圆锥齿轮加工仿型机构的设计改进.
imitated的中文意思:仿效的, 仿造的, 假冒的...,点击查查权威在线词典详细解释imitated的中文翻译,imitated的真人发音,用法和例句等。
...2* imitate vt.模仿 imitator n. 模仿者, 仿效者imitated adj. 模仿的, 效法的, 假冒的imitation n. 模仿, 效法, 冒充, 赝品, 仿造物 imitation brand 冒.

list.abs: 医用术语中英文对照表-梁子同志 ... imitation 模拟，仿制 imitator 模拟器，仿真器 immediate 直接的，即刻的.
自考英语二词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... eclecticism n. 折衷主义 imitator n. 模仿者 guitar n. 六弦琴，吉他.
模仿(imitation)是在没有外界控制的条件下，个体受他人影响而仿效其言行，并使自己的言行与之相同或相似的过程。初中教学阶段， …
实用日常生活英语单词_日常用语 ... pearl 珍珠 imitation 仿制品 genuine 真的.
摹字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 同本义〖 copy;trace〗 仿效〖 imitate〗 描写,描绘〖 describe〗.
高二英语词汇表 ... reality n. 现实;实际存在的事物;真实 imitate vt. 模仿;仿效;仿制 virtual adj. 实质上的;实际上的.

entry.def: If you imitate someone, you copy what they do or produce.

example.ex: ...a genuine German musical which does not try to imitate the American model.
example.tran: 不刻意模仿美国模式的真正的德国音乐剧

example.ex: ...a precedent which may be imitated by other activists in the future.
example.tran: 将来可能会被其他激进分子仿效的先例

entry.def: If you imitate a person or animal, you copy the way they speak or behave, usually because you are trying to be funny.

example.ex: Clarence screws up his face and imitates the Colonel again.
example.tran: 克拉伦斯又板起面孔,模仿起上校来。

auth_sentence.content: This transformation was soon imitated all over the world.

auth_sentence.content: Mr. Keller's salmon tartare cornets have been widely imitated.
